item.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_guide_b: §f§lHamster Tips:§r§6§o Guidebook to the Tiny, Furry Heart§r
block.adorablehamsterpets.wild_green_bea: Yields seeds. Seeds for... enhancement of certain small mammals.
block.adorablehamsterpets.wild_cucumber_: Drops seeds. Seeds that might help you make small friends.
Interact with it. Gently. It's sensitive.
block.adorablehamsterpets.sunflower_bloc: Sometimes yields seeds... key recipe ingredients?
Requires time to replenish its seedy bounty.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_guid: Can be crafted with Sliced Cucumber and a Book.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.green_bean_s: Plant these to grow beans. Beans that empower...
Requires commitment. And maybe some dirt.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cucumber_see: Grow cucumbers. Cucumbers that might... persuade?
Just add water, soil, and existential dread.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.sunflower_se: Apparently important for certain food mixes.
Can also be used as a basic snack.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cucumber.hin: Try preparing it at a crafting table...
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.sliced_cucum: The key to a tiny, furry heart. Or at least, their attention.
A gentle, sneaky approach might be required.
A simple veggie. Can be cooked for... interesting results.
Eat them raw if you enjoy disappointment.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.steamed_gree: Gives hamsters a sudden burst of... enthusiasm?
The effect isn't permanent. Nothing ever is, except taxes.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_food: So good, even the pickiest hamster can't refuse.
Use it when they're being difficult. Or just hungry.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cheese.hint1: A culinary masterpiece. Irresistible to small, furry opportunists.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cheese.hint2: Wave it around in front of a hamster and see what happens.
message.adorablehamsterpets.throw_cooldo: Your hamster needs a break— try again in %d minute and %d seconds.
message.adorablehamsterpets.baby_throw_r: Your baby hamster clings tightly, refusing to become a furry cannonball. Perhaps wait until it's older?
message.adorablehamsterpets.beans_cooldo: Your hamster hasn't calmed down enough from last time yet. (%d min %d sec left).
message.adorablehamsterpets.creeper_dete: Your hamster senses a creeper approaching!
message.adorablehamsterpets.diamond_near: Your hamster smells diamond ore nearby.
message.adorablehamsterpets.sweet_potato: Sweet Potato? An inspired name. Very well.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.2: Your furry co-pilot has touched down.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.3: Shoulder vacant. The hamster has other plans.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.4: Hamster deployed. Or it just fancied a walk.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.5: One less passenger. Your hamster is now free-range.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.6: The hamster returns to terrestrial navigation.
message.adorablehamsterpets.cheek_pouch_: This hamster's cheek pouches are currently shy. A gourmet meal might change its mind...
message.adorablehamsterpets.found_gold_m: Your hamster has located what is technically a valuable mineral. Just not the one it was hoping for. Awkward.
Your hamster proudly presents... gold. It gets a participation trophy for effort.
With unwavering confidence, your hamster has located something shiny. It's just... the wrong shiny.
There's a moment of dawning horror as your hamster realizes this is not, in fact, diamond.
Well... it §ois§r treasure... technically. Your hamster, however, seems to disagree with this assessment.
The epic quest for riches concludes with... gold. Your hamster has begun to contemplate its life choices.
So close, and yet so... gold. The disappointment is palpable.
message.adorablehamsterpets.throwing_dis: Hamster throwing is disabled in config.
message.adorablehamsterpets.shoulder_mou: Your hamster scurries onto your shoulder!
message.adorablehamsterpets.food_refusal: Hamster wants to try something different.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.husband: The Hamster Life
Welcome to your new life as a rodent enthusiast. We won't judge.
The Bait
Transform a humble cucumber into Sliced Cucumber. Rodents go nuts for it.
Pocket Snacks
Whip up some Hamster Food Mix. This is a great opportunity to say 'peckish.' What a fun word.
Seed Money
Acquire Cucumber Seeds. The first step to gaining a tiny, squeaky companion.
A Furry Shadow
Successfully domesticate a wild hamster. May your ankles be ever safe.
Sunflower Hoarder
Gather Sunflower Seeds. They look innocent, but they're part of a larger, fluffier scheme.
A Trustworthy Face
That special Food Mix did the trick! Your hamster now deems you worthy of its cheek-based cargo services.
Shoulder Surfer
Convince a hamster that your shoulder is prime real estate. Hint: Cheese helps.
The Hamster Yeet™
Unleash your shoulder trebuchet. Bonus points for direct Creeper hits. (No hamsters were *terminally harmed in the making of this feature.)
Green Bean Gardener
Procure Green Bean Seeds. These aren't your average beans.
Steamy Greens
Cook up some Green Beans. They smell... suspiciously energizing.
Supercharged Squeaker
Feed your hamster Steamed Green Beans and witness a temporary burst of... ambition.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.technic: You've crafted the sacred texts of hamster lore. Well done.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.husband: Petal Pusher
You've subjected your hamster to floral... decor. Um, good job? Should you regret this aesthetic choice, a pair of shears might be key.
Pocket Paramedic
Your hamster, displaying remarkable self-preservation, raided its own cheek stash. Clever, or just really hungry?
Nose for Treasure
Your shoulder-mounted alarm system just detected... something shiny. Or possibly just lint. Good luck.
Impending Doom Squeak
That high-pitched noise wasn't your tinnitus. Your hamster thinks a Creeper fancies you. Run. Or don't. Your funeral.
Chipmunk Aspirations
Those cheeks are at maximum capacity. Your hamster is either preparing for the apocalypse or just really, really likes snacks.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.recipes: Learned how to craft the Hamster Guide Book.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.husband: Canine Aspirations?
Your hamster successfully sniffed out diamonds! Wow! This mod is amazing!
book.adorablehamsterpets.page1.body:
So, you want hamsters?

An admirable, if slightly predictable, goal.

This guide contains dubious wisdom gleaned from watching small rodents. Use at your own risk.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page2.body1: First, you need bait. The good stuff comes from
book.adorablehamsterpets.page2.body3: in warmer places - plains, savannas, maybe jungle edges. Right-click 'em for seeds.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page3.body1: sometimes yield seeds on right-click. They regrow eventually.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page3.body2: If one seems barren, it might just be an old chunk - try finding one in an area you haven't explored.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body2: on farmland. Once grown, harvest the
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body4: Now, the crucial step: craft the cucumber into
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body5: . This is what the little fuzzballs actually want.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page5.body: Beyond this page lie spoilers. If you prefer blissful ignorance, turn back now. Or don't. I'm a book, not your conscience.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page6.body1: Word on the block is, hamsters adapt. Expect different fur stylings depending on where they originated. Some coats are more...
book.adorablehamsterpets.page6.body3: Breeding can sometimes result in new white markings.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page7.body4: . Approach slowly. Hope it doesn't notice your desperation. Repeat until furry friend acquired.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page8.body2: Right-click your tamed hamster to make it
book.adorablehamsterpets.page8.body3: . It might fall asleep. Right-click again to resume the stalking.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page9.body1: If your hamster has had a disagreement with, well, anything, feed it
book.adorablehamsterpets.page9.body4: (sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, carrot, wheat seeds).
book.adorablehamsterpets.page10.body1: If its healthy, the same basic food might trigger...
book.adorablehamsterpets.page10.body2: . Find another hamster also in Love Mode. Stand back. Nature happens.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page11.body1: Do not feed it the same mundane item twice in a row. It has standards. It will refuse.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page12.body2: ? (Smelt regular Green Beans). They grant Speed, Strength, Absorption & Regen for a bit. Impressive!
book.adorablehamsterpets.page12.body3: ...But there is a cooldown before it works again. Less impressive.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body1: Inventory... in their face. Feed epic snack to earn trust... and cheek access. Then
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body2: a tamed hamster for 6 slots of prime real estate.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body3: If hurt, it can automatically eat
book.adorablehamsterpets.page14.body2: ? Try right-clicking your hamster with them. It's called fashion, look it up. Click again to undo your questionable style choices. No refunds on the petals.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page15.body2: . Wave it with intent near your tamed companion. Things might happen. (You can also eat the cheese. It's suspiciously nourishing and slips right down the old gullet, if you can stomach the... moist sounds.)
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body1: Your shoulder companion may alert you to nearby
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body2: that have noticed you, or shiny
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body3: . Listen for the unique squeaks and sniffs amongst your own panicked breathing.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page17.body2: has targeted YOU. Not just nearby,
book.adorablehamsterpets.page17.body4: Maybe your hamster is worried its comfy shoulder perch is about to vanish.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page18.body1: Those excited sniffs? Your pocket prospector smells
book.adorablehamsterpets.page18.body3: It pauses between alerts, so listen carefully before you start digging... again.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page19.body2: from your shoulder? Try letting your fuzzy friend down while it's still got the scent.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page19.body3: If it was really onto something, it might just decide to lead you to the jackpot.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page20.body1: For when words fail and you need a furry, surprisingly aerodynamic solution. Aim (don't stare right at a block), press
book.adorablehamsterpets.page20.body2: (or your chosen keybind of yeeting). Effective against Creepers. Hamster passes out upon impact. Go console it.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page21.body2: not throwing your hamster? Did you add this mod to an existing world? Woopsy.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page22.body: Not a fan of earning your hamster's trust for cheek storage? Wish those tooltips would just vanish? Good news for the micromanagers: this mod is highly configurable. Tweak to your heart's content. Or break everything. Your call.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.header: Misplaced this invaluable tome of rodent wisdom?
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.body1: Shocking. Craft another with a vanilla
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.body3: . Don't ask why Sliced Cucumber. It's a long story involving a very particular hamster and an unfortunate picnic incident.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.helpAndR: Buttons to press when you're lost, bored, or have found a bug that isn't just a hamster exhibiting existential angst.
Misplaced your invaluable tome of rodent wisdom? Click here. I won't tell anyone.
Found a game-breaking issue? Or a hamster phasing through the floor? Let me know on Github. The more details, the better. And believe it or not, I do check this frequently.
Shameless plug for my other, less-rodent-focused work. Click if you dare.
Join 'The Hamster Pouch' official Discord server. A place to share screenshots, get support, or just witness the ongoing development chaos. You're invited.
